title: Hairspray (1988) original John Waters soundtrack + bonus + cover
description:
Hairspray (1988) - original John Waters soundtrack + bonus tracks + cover


This torrent comprises:

- the complete original soundtrack album for the John Waters film (12 tracks),

- 16 bonus tracks which were also used and credited in the film, but which weren't included on the officially-released album.


ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK ALBUM
01. Rachel Sweet - Hairspray
02. The Ray Bryant Combo - The Madison Time
03. The Ikettes - I'm Blue (The Gong-Gong Song)
04. Jan Bradley - Mama Didn't Lie
05. Gene Pitney - Town Without Pity
06. Gene and Wendell - The Roach (Dance)
07. The Flares - Foot Stompin'
08. The Five Du-Tones - Shake A Tail Feather
09. Jerry Dallman and the Knightcaps - The Bug
10. Barbara Lynn - You'll Lose A Good Thing
11. Little Peggy March - I Wish I Were A Princess
12. Toussaint McCall - Nothing Takes The Place Of You

BONUS TRACKS (USED IN THE FILM, BUT NOT ON THE OFFICIAL ALBUM)
# Bunker Hill - Hide And Go Seek (Part 1)
# Chubby Checker - Dancin' Party
# Chubby Checker - Let's Twist Again
# Chubby Checker - Limbo Rock
# Chubby Checker - Pony Time
# Chubby Checker - The Fly
# Dee Dee Sharp - Gravy (For My Mashed Potatoes)
# Dee Dee Sharp - Mashed Potato Time
# Gene Chandler - Duke Of Earl
# Lesley Gore - You Don't Own Me
# Pia Zadora - Day-O
# The Bracelets - Waddle Waddle
# The Champs - Train To Nowhere
# The Dovells - Do The New Continental
# The Dutones - The Bird
# The Lafayettes - Life's Too Short


Notes:
-  "The Bird" by The Dutones (incorrectly credited in the film as The Two Dutones) was recorded in 1962, and was the only single recorded by this group.  It has no connection with the group The Five Du-Tones (who also appear in the film).
-  "Waddle Waddle" by The Bracelets was incorrectly credited in the film to The Bracelettes
-  "You Don't Own Me" by Lesley Gore was incorrectly credited in the film to Leslie Gore
